medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started at 6 am today, most severe in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) with associated nausea. Denies fever, chills, dysuria, diarrhea, and malaise. Poor appetite earlier, now improving. Patient has never experienced pain like this before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past Medical History: None; Past Surgical History: left neck cyst excision, tonsillectomy, wisdom teeth extraction.
